conclusion: Analyze how shadows change when light source moves to the right above objects
Four objects on stone slabs: egg, apple, baseball, microphone with shadows cast to the right
Shadows move opposite to light source, shorten when light is directly above, lengthen at lower angle
All shadows will shift to the left when light moves right
Shadows currently to the right will move beneath or to the left of objects
Shadows of apple and microphone may shorten then lengthen as light moves over
Shadows of egg and baseball will likely lengthen as light moves away from directly above
Shadow shapes may change, becoming elongated or compressed
Final answer: Shadows shift left, left objects' shadows lengthen, right objects' shadows may shorten then lengthen, shadow direction changes, edges may sharpen or diffuse
